name: Super World Karts GP - 16-bit mode7 style karts!
blurb: Classic 16-bit style retro karting for PC / Mac / Linux / iOS / Android / OUYA : : Awesome News! : : Now coming with more FIST!!! -.-

rewards.reward: No Reward
Spectator - my sincere thanks and good wishes to you for believing in me and making SWK a reality!
Backer - as above but thanked and named in the credits as a backer, plus a stack of sweet Super World Karts wallpapers
Super Early Backer - Thanked and named in the credits as a Super Early Backer, all previous rewards, plus ONE digital copy of the PC -OR- MAC versions ONLY of Super World Karts!

Super Early Backer 2 - Thanked and named in the credits as a Super Early Backer, all previous rewards, plus ONE digital copy of the PC -OR- MAC -OR- LINUX -OR- OUYA versions ONLY of Super World Karts!

Super Backer = OUYA + PC + MAC + LINUX. This is the same tier as the $16 Super Backer tier below, I just cant edit the Super Backer tier now. The rewards are identical. $16 or more gets you the OUYA version and all Desktop versions of Super World Karts!
Super Backer - Thanked and named in the credits as a super backer, all previous rewards, plus a digital copy of the desktop version of Super World Karts!

Co-driver Backer - Thanked and named in the credits as a Co-driver Backer, all previous rewards, plus a digital PDF with the maps of each track showing the locations of all rings, shortcuts, and shrooms!

Early Bird Champion Backer - Same rewards as the Champion Backer tier but at a limited quantity lower price. Thanked and named in the credits as a Champion Backer, all previous rewards, and a digital copy of the SWK soundtrack.

Champion Backer + EARLY ACCESS - Thanked and named in the credits as a champion backer, all previous rewards, and a digital copy of the SWK soundtrack.  + EARLY ACCESS: all of the above benefits, plus Early Access - get hold of the game while it\u2019s still in development and help shape SWK with suggestions and feedback! (Early Access will be granted shortly after the kickstarter campaign has ended and the funding goal is met)
Hero Backer - Thanked and named in the credits as a hero backer, all previous rewards, and an exclusive badge and stickers pack.

Physical Backer - PHYSICAL GAME BOX and AUDIO CD - Thanked and named in the credits as a Physical Backer, all previous rewards + digital versions of game and OST, my eternal gratitude (void upon my death), and an extremely rare physical copy of v1.0 of the game for Windows/Mac/Linux with a SNES style box and soundtrack on a CD!

SWK *PIT CREW* MUG - Thanked and named in the credits as a *PIT CREW* member, all previous rewards, and receive a highly exclusive, Super World Karts *PIT CREW* mug! Excludes other "pit crew" tier rewards

SWK *PIT CREW* CAP - Thanked and named in the credits as a *PIT CREW* member, all previous rewards, and receive a highly exclusive, Super World Karts *PIT CREW* cap! \r\nExcludes other "pit crew" tier rewards

Joyful Backer - Thanked and named in the credits as a Joyful Backer, all previous rewards, and overdose your nostalgia receptors with an exclusive, limited edition, 'Super World Karts' SNES style replica PC USB joypad! (Vista/XP/Win7 PC compatible)
Legend Backer - Thanked and named in the credits as a Legend Backer, all previous rewards, and an exclusive limited edition (only 20 made), Super World Karts T-Shirt.

Artist Backer - Thanked and named in the credits as an Artist Backer, all previous rewards, and an exclusive, limited edition, Super World Karts art book. Featuring 50 beautiful pages of: track maps, showing all item locations and secret shortcuts. Sprite sheets, skylines, and other art work.

Weapons Designer - Got a good idea for a weapon to be used in combat? Weapon must be food based, easily recognisable as an icon, make sense, and not be a nuke. Credited in the game as a weapons designer. All previous rewards included. (only 4 avail)

Track Designer - select a town or city to be featured as a track in the Kickstarter Cup, put your city on the map! Credited in the game as a track designer. Receive email correspondence about your design. All previous rewards included, except WeaponsDesigner. (only 5 avail)

Character Designer - select an animal not already featured, describe and name them! (Sensible names only please, your name may well be "Phil McRackin" but sensible it is not.) Credited in the game as a character designer. All previous rewards included, except TrackDesigner and WeaponsDesigner. (only 4 avail)

THE CHRISTMAS MIRACLE! This is the saviour tier. With it Super World Karts could still happen, and it could come down to YOU alone! My HERO! As a miracle worker you'd receive every reward above! The game, the physical box, the audio cd, the T-shirt, the art book, the badges, the stickers, the joypad, the hat, the cup, design a weapon, design a track, design a character! The character could even be you! Or it could be a character you own the rights to from a movie, game, book, or just your notepad scribble! You'd also get the most special of spots on both the credits roll and the Credits Highway stage.
